name: Custom Made Friendship Feather Charm Bracelet
description:
These hand-made and woven friendship bracelets are fun and cute to wear anywhere and anytime! Inspired by the bracelets in our childhood days, these bracelets are sturdier and clasp on easier for durable wear. Wear one for a pop of color to an outfit or wear dozens for a more eye-catching look!

Each bracelet comes with feather and crystal charms and a gold lobster clasp to create a fun twist to the classic style.

An order for this is made custom to how you want it. It's available in a variety of thread colors.

Upon placing order, please message me the following info and preferences: 
-Wrist size (and if you want it fitted or loose) 
-Color pattern: You can choose up to 8 colors and indicate the color order. (or if you like one of the color patterns in one of the images, feel free to indicate which one you'd like) 
****Colors: 
*Black 
*White 
*Blue 
*Turquoise 
*Light Blue-Grey 
*Red 
*Green 
*Lime Green 
*Purple 
*Lavender 
*Bubblegum Pink 
*Light Pink 
*Yellow 
*Orange

Please message me if you have any questions :D
